intro.subtitle: OUR PHILOSOPHY
intro.title: Not just photos.
intro.description: We believe weddings are best captured naturally — real moments, real emotions, no force, no rush. Based in Chittagong and working across Bangladesh, we focus on calm storytelling that lets your day speak for itself.

videoSection.title: The Cinematic Film
videoSection.description: Motion allows us to capture the vows, the laughter, and the tears in a way photography alone cannot.
